top_comments.comment: God bless you young lady you are wise I love a simple life not tied to a 50 year mortgage, these that is how they keep people poor.
Love the bed is easy to fold out
Great design for your van, love the bed/couch set up. Lots of space for guests. Well thought out seating, very nice changes you have made. Love the shower.
Fantastic! Any ideas where Steph accessed her fold-out bed? Can’t find online.
Beautiful! Love the bed set up and the shower! Happy travels!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Great layout, looks very comfortable

That bed is called a jackknife.  I have seen them in sofas, but never in a bed set up in a van like this.  Did she make this, or hopefully, did she buy this somewhere?  If yes, could information be provided where she purchased the jackknife?  

My son is getting his degree in forestry, and I really want to renovate a van into a camper to visit him while he is doing his internships.  This kind of bed set up would be absolutely perfect!

Toilet in kitchen?  
She likes winter sports but puts water tank on outside where it can freeze?  
Shower is surrounded by clothes?  The dampness will put mold into the fabric.
Heavy glass jars rolling around in electrical cabinet?
Propane tanks - how are they going to be accessed for refills?  Does the propane guy have to crawl under van to refill?  This is truly awful design.
The heavy duty toaster oven has zero overhead clearance.  If you operate it inside that cabinet the risk of fire is guaranteed. 

Design of van layout is faulty and not well thought out.  Disappointing.
Beautiful. I'd get a bed topper as well, and tuck it away somewhere
Good book! “The Hidden Life of Trees”! Have read-it! 🙂
Best configuration I have seen for this type of van; amazing!
Beautiful! Love the bed set up and the shower! Happy travels!
Hello from Oklahoma.
Awesome van.  Is that a medium wheel base?

Digital nomad.... solo female van life...
... clever cookie cutter:)
Lots of cookies on YouTube the same.
Fantastic! Any ideas where Steph accessed her fold-out bed? Can’t find online.
Great design for your van, love the bed/couch set up. Lots of space for guests. Well thought out seating, very nice changes you have made. Love the shower.
Looks super dysfunctional.
Love the bed is easy to fold out
So the rear doors are basically useless? The shower seems prevent its effective use.
Where do you get mail sent to when you live in a van such as Amazon packages?
God bless you young lady you are wise I love a simple life not tied to a 50 year mortgage, these that is how they keep people poor.
Love this set up!  You don’t need to have the extended wheelbase to have all of the amenities you need.
I love it. It looks spacious and comfortable.
